attributes.action: Investigate Ticket Masters / Live Nations unjust ticket selling behaviours.
attributes.additional_details: Live Nation promotes the gigs and sells the gig tickets on Ticket Master, Tickets on ticket master are gone within the first couple of mins then they are immediately resold at a huge increase to fans on secondary ticket sites, owned and promoted by TicketMaster. Live Nation, Ticket Master and secondary sites GetMeIn and Seatwave are owned but the same company.
attributes.background: TicketMaster & secondary ticket sites GetMeIn and Seatwave are owned by the same company. When tickets go on sale on TicketMaster they are immediately sold out and sold on the secondary ticket sites for a huge increase in price. Live Nation is owned by the same company and is the event promoter.
